artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Sasaki Toyokichi
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; battle scene with charging soldiers; three soldiers on horseback on right and center images; plumes of smoke; soldiers in black uniforms on right, with waving flag with red circle in center surrounded by stripes; blue sky in ULQ of image
inscription: on left sheet, on back, in bottom center, in pencil: 122MI8 | on right sheet, on back, in bottom center, in pencil: 122MI8
markings: URC red collector\'s seal: 水〇〇翠蔵〇
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of Our Forces' Great Victory in Demolishing Asan
